title: Build jewelry e-commerce platform with admin panel and carousel management

requirements.text: Implement three product categories: 22K Gold, 18K Gold, and 9K Gold. Update the product catalog data model to support these categories and ensure all product management flows use these categories.
acceptanceCriteria: Product model includes category field supporting 22K Gold, 18K Gold, and 9K Gold
Product filter/search allows filtering by these three categories
Admin panel product forms show these three category options

requirements.text: Add a running banner positioned directly below the header that displays 'Lab Grown Diamonds' content. The banner should be visible on all pages and use the site's metallic gold styling theme.

quotes: Just below the header keep a running banner with content Lab Grown Diamonds

acceptanceCriteria: Banner appears immediately below header on all pages
Banner displays 'Lab Grown Diamonds' text
Banner styling matches the gold theme

requirements.text: Enhance admin panel to include full product management (add/edit/delete products), inventory management capabilities, order viewing functionality, and carousel management with URL configuration for each carousel item.

quotes: for admin control add/edit/delete products, manage inventory, view orders, add/edit carousel with URL

acceptanceCriteria: Admin can add, edit, and delete products
Admin can manage product inventory levels
Admin can view all orders
Admin can add, edit, and delete carousel items with URL links

requirements.text: Integrate Google Pay UPI for checkout and payment processing. Replace or enhance existing payment flow to support UPI-based transactions through Google Pay.

quotes: for checkout and payment integrate gpay UPI

acceptanceCriteria: Checkout page displays Google Pay UPI payment option
UPI payment flow is integrated and functional
Order confirmation occurs after successful UPI payment

requirements.text: Create a homepage carousel positioned in the body section that displays images uploaded and managed through the admin control panel. The carousel should support multiple images with navigation controls.

quotes: carousel should display the images uploaded from admin control. Positioned in home page body

acceptanceCriteria: Carousel appears in homepage body section
Carousel displays admin-uploaded images
Carousel includes navigation controls (prev/next)
Admin can upload images for carousel through admin panel

requirements.text: Match the design styling from the Aurelie Fine Jewellery reference site (https://aurelie-fine-jewellery-wgl.caffeine.xyz/admin) including header layout, footer layout, and background color scheme throughout the application.

quotes: Replicate the product category, features of Admin control,  Header and footer, background colour

acceptanceCriteria: Header layout matches reference site styling
Footer layout matches reference site styling
Background colors match reference site theme
Overall visual consistency with reference site

constraints: Use existing backend main.mo single-actor architecture
Preserve existing authentication flow using Internet Identity
Keep existing product, order, and cart data structures compatible
nonGoals: Migrating to a different authentication system
Supporting payment methods other than Google Pay UPI
Adding product categories beyond 22K, 18K, and 9K Gold
Implementing real-time inventory syncing with external systems
